name: Downcave
description:
Downcave is a roguelike shooter platformer  

Travel as deep down as you can, collect experience and weapons to get stronger  

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2

Extract the zip file to play the executable  

Assets:

Pixel mobs

"Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup" Assets:  

Sound Effects, Subspace Audio

Humble Fonts (Equipment pro)
